data.chText: 便携式的；手提的；轻便的
data.enText: that is easy to carry or to move

data.chText: 可转移贷款 / 养老金
data.enText: a portable loan/pension (= that can be moved if you change banks, jobs, etc.)

data.chText: 新型的轻质外壳使这种型号携带更轻便。
data.enText: The new light cover increases this model's portability.

data.chText: 便携机；（尤指）手提电脑，便携式电视机
data.enText: a small type of machine that is easy to carry, especially a computer or a television

word_means: 手提电脑，便携式电视机
simple_means.memory_skill: port 拿，运 + able 能…的 → 能拿的 → 便携式的

means: (尤指)手提电脑，便携式电视机

tr: usually with a case in which it can be carried
of a motor designed to be attached to the outside of a boat's hull

value.def: A portable machine or device is designed to be easily carried or moved.

example.ex: There was a little portable television switched on behind the bar...
example.tran: 柜台后面有一台开着的便携式小型电视机。

example.ex: I always carry a portable computer with me.
example.tran: 我总是随身携带一台手提电脑。

value.tran: 轻便的；手提式的；便于携带的

example.ex: When it came to choosing photographic equipment portability was as important as reliability.
example.tran: 说起选择摄影器材，轻便性和可靠性一样重要。

value.def: A portable is something such as a television, radio, or computer which can be easily carried or moved.

example.ex: We bought a colour portable for the bedroom.
example.tran: 我们买了一台便携式小彩电放在卧室里。

value.tran: 手提式电视机；袖珍收音机；笔记本电脑

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 去掉 + port 拿，运 → 拿出去 → 放逐
ex 出 + port 拿，运 → 运出〔港口〕→ 出口
im 进入 + port 拿，运 → 进入〔港口〕→ 进口
port 拿，运 + able 能…的 → 能拿的 → 便携式的
port 拿，运 + age 表费用；表行为或行为的结果 → 搬运；运费
port 拿，运 + er 表名词 → 搬运工
port 拿，运 + foli 树叶，引申为页 + o 表物 → 可装运书页的东西 → 文件夹
sup 下 + port 运 → 从下面运送 → 支持
trans 转移 + port 拿，运 → 从一个地方拿到另一个地方 → 运输
ap 加强 + port 部分；分开 + ion 表动作 → 把整体分开 → 分配
dis 不 + proportion 比例 + al …的 → 不成比例的
port 部分；分开 + ion 表名词 → 部分
pro 在前 + port 部分；分开 + ion 表名词 → 按之前的量分开 →〔所占〕比例
